segments.text: This is our main service area . We do all the routine services here and have two full-time mechanics .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How often do you service the vans ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: They're serviced regularly . We give them a basic service every 10,000 km or so and a main service once a year , or every 100,000 km .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I see . What does the service involve ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , the same as for private vehicles really , but we do it more often because they get a lot of wear and tear .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Can you carry out major repairs here ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , we've got all the necessary equipment . We can give the engines a major overhaul . If there's a serious problem , we strip down the engine and find the faulty component . Would you like to look around ?
segments.speaker: S1
